data.name: IOS-XE Flow Config - Kentik - Example

data.template:
conf t

interface GigabitEthernet1
    no ip flow monitor itential-monitor input
interface GigabitEthernet1.33
    no ip flow monitor itential-monitor input
no snmp-server community kentikSNMP RO 
no sampler itential-sampler
no flow monitor itential-monitor
no flow exporter itential-exporter
no flow record itential-flow
data.name: IOS-XE Flow Config - Reset - Kentik - Example
Build IAG Device Configuration Push Data
data.description: Builds inputs for pushing configuration to device over IAG

[/code]

data.name: Process Kentik Device Onboarding Reset Form Inputs
data.description: Process Kentik form inputs for device onboarding

data.name: Process AWS Blocked Traffic Event - Reset Inputs
data.description: Processes AWS blocked traffic event - reset inputs

steps.template:
Device Onboarding has begun for device ${deviceName}.
  • Itential Job
  • ServiceNow Change Request

Device Onboarding has completed for device ${deviceName}. Traffic flow is being captured and can be seen in Kentik.
  • Itential Job
  • ServiceNow Change Request
  • Kentik

data.name: Device ID to Netbox Asset Tag - Kentik - Example

steps.template:
[code]An alert has been captured in Kentik about a blocked Security Group (${securityGroupName}) for the Web Server.
  • ${kentikURLName0}
  • ${kentikURL1Name}
  • Itential Job
  • IP Source: ${ipSource}
  • IP Destination: ${ipDestination}
  • AS Source: ${asSource}
[/code]

An alert has been captured in Kentik about a blocked Security Group (${securityGroupName}) for the Web Server.
  • ${kentikURLName0}
  • ${kentikURL1Name}
  • Itential Job
  • ServiceNow Change Request
  • IP Source: ${ipSource}
  • IP Destination: ${ipDestination}
  • AS Source: ${asSource}

${renderedTeamsMessage}
An automated attempt to remediate the problem will now occur.

${renderedTeamsMessage}
Remediation Successful! Security Group has been altered to authorize ingress traffic.

${renderedTeamsMessage}
Remediation Failed! Security Group already includes source IP.
ServiceNow Incident Opened: ServiceNow Incident

data.name: AWS Blocked Traffic Event - Allowed List Error

steps.template:
An alert has been captured in Kentik about a blocked Security Group (${securityGroupName}) for the Web Server.
  • ${kentikURLName0}
  • ${kentikURL1Name}
  • Itential Job
  • IP Source: ${ipSource}
  • IP Destination: ${ipDestination}
  • AS Source: ${asSource}
However, the auto remediation request was ignored since the source IP is not part of the allowed IP List:
    ${allowedIPList}

readme:
# Kentik - REST - Example ## Overview Project for example workflows involving Kentik, NetBox, ServiceNow, AWS, MS Teams, and IAG. AWS Blocked Traffic - Kentik - Example AWS Blocked Traffic - Reset - Kentik - Example Device Onboarding - Kentik - Example Device Onboarding - Reset - Kentik - Example ## External Dependencies
Name OS Version API Version
Itential Automation Gateway
Kentik
AWS
MS Teams
NetBox
ServiceNow
## Adapters
Name Version
adapter-kentik_v5 ^0.1.1
adapter-ms_teams ^0.13.0
adapter-netbox_v33 ^2.0.0
adapter-automation_gateway ^4.29.0-2023.1.12
adapter-aws_ec2 ^0.6.9
adapter-service_now ^2.6.3
